name: United Natural Foods, Inc.
summary: United Natural Foods, Inc. (UNFI) is the largest publicly traded wholesale distributor of natural, organic, and specialty foods in the United States and Canada. Headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, UNFI supplies major retailers including Whole Foods Market and operates under several brands, offering a broad portfolio of food and non-food products. The company was established in 1996 through the merger of regional distributors and has grown through significant acquisitions, including SUPERVALU in 2018.
